## containsValue() function

Determines whether a map contains a specified value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function containsValue<T1, T2>(map: Map<T1, T2>, value: T2): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | <code>Map&lt;T1, T2&gt;</code> | the map to search |
|  value | <code>T2</code> | the value to search for |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if the map contains the value; otherwise, false
